text: Austrocylindropuntia is a genus of cacti (family Cactaceae) with 11 recognized species, which were once included in the genus Opuntia. Some are native to South America. ==Species== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Image !! Scientific name !! Distribution |- |120px || Austrocylindropuntia cylindrica || Ecuador (Azuay, Bolivar, Canar, Carchi, Chimborazo, Cotopaxi, Imbabura, Napo, Pichincha, Sucumbios, Tungurahua) |- |120px || Austrocylindropuntia floccosa || Peru, Bolivia |- | || Austrocylindropuntia hirschii || Peru |- |120px || Austrocylindropuntia lagopus || Peru, Bolivia |- |120px || Austrocylindropuntia pachypus|| Peru (Ancash, Lima) |- | || Austrocylindropuntia punta-caillan || Peru (Ancash) |- | || Austrocylindropuntia shaferi || Argentina (Jujuy) |- |120px || Austrocylindropuntia subulata || Peru (Cusco, Lima, Puno ) |- | || Austrocylindropuntia verschaffeltii || Argentina(Catamarca, Jujuy, Salta), Bolivia(La Paz, Oruro, Potosi), Chile (Antofagasta ) |- |120px || Austrocylindropuntia vestita || Argentina, Bolivia |- | || Austrocylindropuntia yanganucensis || |- |} ==External links== * Cactaceae: Members of the genus Austrocylindropuntia Category:Cacti of South America Category:Opuntioideae genera Category:Opuntioideae
title: Austrocylindropuntia
